verses.roman:
ei kathā loka giyā prabhure kahila
śuniyā prabhura mane baḍa sukha ha-ila

synonyms: ei kathā—this message; loka—people; giyā—going; prabhure—unto Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kahila—informed; śuniyā—hearing; prabhura mane—in the mind of the Lord; baḍa—very much; sukha—happiness; ha-ila—became.
translation: When this message was relayed to Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu by the people, the Lord became very happy to hear it.
